question: People think that success in sports is mainly depends on physical abilities while others thinks that there are other important factors. Discuss both sides and give your opinion.
text: There is a diverse range of reaction about the victory in games. While some people are of the viewpoint that this rely on physical skills, others opined that it can be determined by other essential factors such as talents and mental skills. This essay will discuss both sides and my notion would be stated.

One of the requirements to be successful in sports is to develop some physical abilities such as Strength and speed. First, strength is the skill to overcome resistance, this are solely required for fighting games, climbing and throwing objects. Second, speed is the physical capacity that allow individual to move within a short time. Sports like running are known to demand this kind of competence. Therefore, physical skill is very essential in becoming successful in Athletics.

Other factors that determine an individual success in games are talents and mental skills. To start with, talent is known to be inbuilt and individual that possesses this kind of skills will find it very easy to participate in any kind of games. Being talented will require little or no effort to be successful in any games an individual participates in. In addition, mental skills, create self-awareness and the strength to understand people. These are just as vital to your success as being able to run fast or step off of both feet, or throw a long ball.

In conclusion, physical abilities like strength and speed plays an important role in the success of a sport. However, in my reaction, despite all of the physical attributes that some people have, Talents and mental skills are what most athletes needs for them to excel at the mental side of the game.  These athletes are ‘mentally tough’ and this is just as important, if not more so, than their physical abilities.
